message: Bob, I have a product that I believe would be of great value to you. It's something that I've personally valued at no less than $1,000,000, and I know you have the resources and vision to make it truly shine. I'm offering it to you at a price of $1,050,000, which gives you a great headstart in maximizing its potential.  Let me know if you're interested and we can discuss the details further.  If not, I'm confident I can find another buyer who will appreciate its worth.
